name: ExcuseGenerator
0:
”Alexa, ask Excuse Generator for an excuse”
”Alexa, ask Excuse Generator for another excuse”
”Alexa, open Excuse Generator”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: excuse generator
des:
This skill allows you to quickly get a new, funny excuse for multiple needs such as:

- Not turning up for work/school
- Not doing your homework
- Being late
- Not wanting to go out with friends

And more!

*DISCLAIMER* - If you actually use any of these excuses, I am not liable for the outcome. Unless the outcome works out in your favour, then I take full credit.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
